module.name: StaticContentSample
module.param: This dashboard provides a view into the processes running on your virtual desktops. Disk I/O, %CPU and memory consumption data are captured for each process. For detailed views on other counters look under Reports/Environment in the navigation above. To view the entire result set or for this report or manipulate the data further, click on the View Full Report link below.

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `perfmon_process` | table vm_name Value counter instance process_name | eval mem = if(counter=="Virtual Bytes",Value,"") | eval cpu = if(counter=="% Processor Time",Value,"") | eval ioread = if(counter="IO Read Operations/sec",Value,"") | eval iowrite = if(counter="IO Write Operations/sec",Value,"")

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: stats values(vm_name) as vm | eval range="vmsreporting"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | stats max(mem) as bits by process_name| `bits2mb` | rename bits to "Memory in MB"| rename process_name as Process | sort - "Memory in MB" | head 10

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: search process_name!=idle cpu!="" | stats max(cpu) as "%CPU" by process_name | rename process_name as Process | sort - "%CPU" | head 10

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.group: Avg Disk/Network IO Write by Process
module.param: search iowrite!="" | stats avg(iowrite) as "Avg I/O Write Operations" by process_name | rename process_name as Process | sort - "Avg I/O Write Operations" | head 10

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.group: Avg Disk/Network IO Read by Process
module.param: search ioread!="" | stats avg(ioread) as "Avg I/O Read Operations" by process_name | rename process_name as Process | sort - "Avg I/O Read Operations" | head 10
